targetLine.text: All right, pops, what's the gag? How did you know what the score was gonna be?
targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part II

contextBefore.text: Here comes Decker with the kick. It's up. It looks good, folks! It looks very good. Field goal! UCLA wins 19-17. Listen to that Coliseum crowd go wild. Jim Decker...

contextAfter.text: I told ya. It's in this book. All you gotta do is bet on the winner, and you'll never lose.
All right. I'll--I'll take a look at it.
You damn FOOL! Never, NEVER leave this book layin' around!

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
